original: api tu sūtra uktaṃ “catvāra ime āhārā bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāye“ti / [153/09]

analyzed: tatas śūnye bhājane itas eva sāmantakāt sattvānām tad ākṣepake karmaṇi parikṣīṇe sapta sūryāḥ prādurbhūya krameṇa yāvat pṛthivīm sumerum ca niḥśeṣam
dahanti

original: tasmādevaṃ prajvalitādarcirvāyunā kṣiptaṃ śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ nirdahat paraiti / [179/05]
analyzed: tasmāt evam prajvalitāt arciḥ vāyunā kṣiptam śūnyam brāhmam vimānam nirdahat paraiti
tat ca tad bhūmikam eva arciḥ veditavyam
nahi visa bhāgāḥ apakṣālāḥ kramante
tad saṃbaddha saṃbhūta tvāt tasmāt tat iti uktam
kāma avacaraḥ hi agniḥ rūpa avacaram agnim saṃbadhnāti iti
evam anyasyām api saṃvartanyām yathāyogam veditavyam iti

original: narakeṣu sattvānāṃ cyutyanutpādāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanānāṃ saṃkṣaya eṣa kālaḥ / [179/10]
analyzed: narakeṣu sattvānām cyuti anutpādāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanānām saṃkṣayaḥ eṣa kālaḥ
vivarta kalpaḥ prāk vāyoḥ yāvat naraka saṃbhavaḥ

original: thamādvāyoḥ prabhṛti yāvannarakeṣu sattvasambhavaḥ eṣa kālo vivartakalpa ityucyate / [179/12-179/14]
analyzed: thamāt vāyoḥ prabhṛti yāvat narakeṣu sattva sambhavaḥ eṣa kālaḥ vivarta kalpaḥ iti ucyate

original: tathā saṃvṛte hi loka ākāśamātrāvaśeṣaścira kālaṃ tiṣṭhati yāvat punarapi sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena bhājanānāṃ pūrvanimittabhūtā ākāśe mandamandā  #
analyzed: tathā saṃvṛte hi loke ākāśa mātra avaśeṣaḥ cira kālam tiṣṭhati yāvat punar api sattvānām karma ādhipatyena bhājanānām pūrva nimitta bhūtā ākāśe manda mandā  /
vāyavaḥ syandante

original: tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān saṃvṛtto'sthāttanniryātaṃ vaktavyam / [179/15]
analyzed: tadā yat ayam lokaḥ viṃśatim antara kalpān saṃvṛttaḥ asthāt tat niryātam vaktavyam
yat viṃśatim antara kalpān vivarttiṣyate tat upayātam vaktavyam

original: tataste vāyavo vardhamānā yathoktaṃ vāyumaṇḍalaṃ jāyate / [179/16-179/17]
analyzed: tatas te vāyavaḥ vardhamānāḥ yathā uktam vāyu maṇḍalam jāyate  /

original: tataḥ śanairyathoktakramavidhānaṃ sarvaṃ jāyate apmaṇḍalaṃ kāñcanamayī mahāpṛthivī dvīpāḥ sumervādayaśca / [179/17-179/18]
analyzed: tatas śanais yathā ukta krama vidhānam sarvam jāyate ap maṇḍalam kāñcana mayī mahā pṛthivī dvīpāḥ sumeru ādayaḥ ca
prathamam tu brāhma vimānam utpadyate
tatas yāvat yāmīyam tatas vāyu maṇḍala ādīni

original: iyatā'yaṃ loko vivṛtto bhavati yaduta bhājanavivartanyā / [179/19-179/20]
analyzed: iyatā ayam lokaḥ vivṛttaḥ bhavati yat uta bhājana vivartanyā

original: athānyataraḥ sattva ābhāsvarebhyaścyutvā śūnye brāhme vimāna utpadyate / [179/20-179/21]
analyzed: atha anyataraḥ sattvaḥ ābhāsvarebhyaḥ cyutvā śūnye brāhme vimāne utpadyate
anye api sattvāḥ tatas cyutvā brahma purohiteṣu upapadyante
tatas brahmakāyikeṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu

original: krameṇa yāvaduttarakurau godānīye pūrvavidehe jambūdvīpe preteṣu tiryakṣu narakeṣūpapadyante / [179/22-179/23]
analyzed: krameṇa yāvat uttarakurau godānīye pūrvavidehe jambūdvīpe preteṣu tiryakṣu narakeṣu upapadyante  /

original: dharmatā hyeṣā yat paścāt saṃvartate tat pūrvaṃ vivarttate / [179/23-179/24]
analyzed: dharmatā hi eṣā yat paścāt saṃvartate tat pūrvam vivarttate

original: yadā narakeṣvekaḥ sattvo'pi prādurbhūto bhavati tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate tanniryātaṃ bhavati / [179/24-179/25]
analyzed: yadā narakeṣu ekaḥ sattvaḥ api prādurbhūtaḥ bhavati tadā yat ayam lokaḥ viṃśatim antara kalpān vivartate tat niryātam bhavati
yat viṃśatim antar alpān vivarttaḥ sthāsyati tat upayātam bhavati
antar kalpaḥ amitāt yāvat daśa varṣa āyuṣaḥ

original: vivartamāne loke ekānna viṃśatirantarakalpā aparimitāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmatikrāmanti / [180/01-180/02]

analyzed: tebhyaḥ hi daśa varṣa āyuṣkebhyaḥ utkarṣam gacchantaḥ krameṇa aśīti varṣa sahasra āyuṣaḥ bhavanti
punar ca apakarṣam gacchantaḥ daśa varṣa āyuṣaḥ bhavanti

original: nātaḥ pareṇa vardhante yāvāneva cānyeṣāmantarakalpānāmutkarṣāpakarṣakālastāvāneva prathamasyāpakarṣakālaḥ paścimasya cotkarṣakāla iti samānakālāḥ  #

idānīm etat śrāddhā āsyate

original: kāruṇikaistu śraddhitamevaitat yathā ceha kecidabhyastanairdhṛṇyā asatyapi svārthe paravyasanābhiratā upalabhyante / [182/11-182/12]
analyzed: kāruṇikaiḥ tu śraddhitam eva etat yathā ca iha kecid abhyasta nairdhṛṇyāḥ asati api sva arthe para vyasana abhiratāḥ upalabhyante

original: tathā punarabhyastakāruṇyā asatyapi svārthe parahitakriyābhirāmāḥ santīti saṃbhāvyam / [182/12-182/15]

original: niveśya taddhetorduḥkhānyudvahanti evaṃ punarabhyāsavaśādātmasnehaṃ tebhyo nirvartya
analyzed: niveśya tad hetoḥ duḥkhāni udvahanti evam punar abhyāsa vaśāt ātma sneham tebhyaḥ nirvartya

original: gotrāntarameva hi tattathājātīyaṃ nirvartate yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhena duḥkhāyate sukhena sukhāyate nātmana iti / [182/16]

āha ca atra
hīnaḥ prārthayate sva saṃtati gatam yaiḥ taiḥ upāyaḥ sukham

original: madhyo duḥkhanivṛttimeva na sukhaṃ duḥkhāspadaṃ tadyataḥ /

śreṣṭhaḥ prārthayate sva saṃtati gataiḥ duḥkhaiḥ pareṣām sukham

original: apakarṣasyādhastāt pratyavarā āyurādayaḥ kiṭabhūtatvāt kaṣāyā ucyante / [183/04]
analyzed: apakarṣasya adhastāt pratyavarāḥ āyuḥ ādayaḥ kiṭa bhūta tvāt kaṣāyāḥ ucyante

atha pratyekabuddhānām kasmin kāle utpādaḥ
dvayoḥ pratyekabuddhānām
utkarṣe ayapakarṣe api
dvividhāḥ hi pratyekabuddhāḥ varga cāriṇaḥ khaḍga viṣāṇa kalpāḥ ca
tatra varga cāriṇaḥ śrāvaka pūrviṇaḥ pratyeka jināḥ ucyante
pṛthagjana pūrviṇaḥ api santi iti apare
ye anyatra utpādita nirvedha bhāgīyāḥ iha svayam mārgam abhisaṃbudhyante

original: tathāhi pūrvayogaṃ paṭhanti “parvate kila pañcaśatāni tāpasānāṃ kaṣṭāni tapāṃsi tapyante
analyzed: tathā hi pūrva yogam paṭhanti parvate kila pañca śatāni tāpasānām kaṣṭāni tapāṃsi tapyante

original: sma yāvat pratyekabuddhasahoṣitena markaṭenāgamya tadīryāpathasaṃdarśanāt pratyekabodhimabhisaṃbanddhā” iti / [183/14]
analyzed: sma yāvat pratyekabuddha saha uṣitena markaṭena āgamya tad īryāpatha saṃdarśanāt pratyeka bodhim abhisaṃbanddhāḥ iti

khaḍgaḥ kalpa śata anvayaḥ

original: mahākalpānāṃ śataṃ bodhisaṃbhāreṣu caritaḥ khaḍgaṃ viṣāṇakalpo bhavati / [183/18]

kim punar atra kāraṇam
nahi tāvat aśaktāḥ dharmam deśayitum pratisaṃvid prāpta tvāt

original: śakyaṃ ca taiḥ pūrvabuddhānāṃ śāsanamanusmṛtyāpi dharmaṃ deśayitum / [183/21]

original: anusroto gāminīnāṃ hi prajānāṃ duṣkaraṃ pratisroto nayanam / [183/24-183/25]

original: “yat guru yaccāsannaṃ yaccābhyastaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: yat guru yat ca āsannam yat ca abhyastam kṛtam ca yat
pūrvam pūrvam pūrvam vīpacyate karma saṃsāre

original: tatra vipākahetvāhitaṃ tu vipākaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ vipākaṃ dattvā vinivartate / [477/25-477/26]
analyzed: tatra vipāka hetu āhitam tu vipāka phala dāna sāmarthyam vipākam dattvā vinivartate
sa bhāga hetu āhitam tu nisyanda phala dāna sāmarthyam kliṣṭānām pratipakṣa udayāt vinivartate
akliṣṭānām citta saṃtāna atyanta vinivṛtteḥ yadā parinirvāti
atha kasmāt vipākāt vipāka antaram na utpadyate vīja phalāt iva phala antaram

original: na tāvat dṛṣṭāntena sarvaṃ samānaṃ bhavati / [478/02]
analyzed: na tāvat dṛṣṭāntena sarvam samānam bhavati

original: tatrāpi tu na phalādeva punaḥ phalāntaramutpadyate / [478/02-478/03]
analyzed: tatra api tu na phalāt eva punar phala antaram utpadyate
kim tarhi
viklitti viśeṣa jāt vikāra viśeṣāt

original: yo hi tatra bhūtaprakārāṅkuraṃ nirvartayati sa tasya vījaṃ nānyaḥ / [478/04-478/05]
analyzed: yaḥ hi tatra bhūta prakāra aṅkuram nirvartayati sa tasya vījam na anyaḥ

original: bhāvinyā tu saṃjñāyā sādṛśyādvā pūrvako 'pi saṃtāno bījamityākhyāyate / [478/05-478/07]
analyzed: bhāvinyā tu saṃjñāyā sādṛśyāt vā pūrvakaḥ api saṃtānaḥ bījam iti ākhyāyate

original: evamihāpi tasmādvipākādyadi sadasaddharmaśravaṇā dipratyayaviśeṣajaḥ kuśalasāsravo 'kuśalo vā cittavikāra utpadyate tasmātpunarvikārāntaramutpadyate  #
analyzed: evam iha api tasmāt vipākāt yadi sat asat dharma śravaṇā ādi pratyaya viśeṣa jaḥ kuśala sa āsravaḥ akuśalaḥ vā citta vikāraḥ utpadyate tasmāt punar vikāra antaram utpadyate  /
na anyathā iti samānam etat
athavā punar etat evam vijñātavyam

original: yathā lākṣārasarañjitāt mātuluṅgapuṣpātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phale raktaḥ keśara upajāyate na ca tasmāt punaranyaḥ evaṃ karmajādvipākāt  #
analyzed: yathā lākṣā rasa rañjitāt mātuluṅga puṣpāt saṃtati pariṇāma viśeṣa jaḥ phale raktaḥ keśaraḥ upajāyate na ca tasmāt punar anyaḥ evam karma jāt vipākāt  /
na punar vipāka antaram iti
yathāsthūlam idam asmad buddhi gamyam darśitam

original: nānāvidhaśaktibhinnaistu karmabhiradhivāsitāḥ saṃtataya etāmavasthāṃ gatā īdṛśaṃ phalamabhinivartayantīti buddhānāmeva viṣayaḥ / [478/11]
analyzed: nānāvidha śakti bhinnaiḥ tu karmabhiḥ adhivāsitāḥ saṃtatayaḥ etām avasthām gatāḥ īdṛśam phalam abhinivartayanti iti buddhānām eva viṣayaḥ
āha khalu api
karma tad bhāvanām tasyāḥ vṛtti lābham tatas phalam
niyamena prajānāti buddhāt anyiḥ na sarvathā
iti etām su vihita hetu mārga śuddhām
buddhānām pravacana dharmatām niśamya
andhānām vividha kudṛṣṭi ceṣṭitānām
tīrthyānām matam apavidhya yānti an andhāḥ
imam hi nirvāṇa pura eka vartinīm
tathāgata āditya vacom aśu bhāsvatīm
nirātma tām ārya sahasravāhi tām
na manda cakṣuḥ vivṛtām api īkṣate
iti diś mātram evā idam upadiṣṭam sumedhasām
sva sāmarthya visarpaṇe iti
pudgala kośam abhidharmakośa bhāṣyam samāptam iti
kṛtiḥ iyam ācārya vasubandhu pādānām iti

original: ye dharmahetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
analyzed: ye dharma hetu prabhavāḥ hetum teṣām tathāgataḥ hi avadat
teṣām ca yaḥ nirodhaḥ evaṃvādī mahā śramaṇaḥ
deva dharmaḥ ayam pravara mahāyāna sakala tathāgata śāsana dhūrddharasya uttarāpathika paṇḍita sthavira śrī lāmāvākasya yat atra puṇyam ityādi
śubham astu
